advantagesDescription: The Montreal International Education Center owns multiple colleges in Canada, a gold-standard team of lawyers, and DELF/TEFAQ examination centers

collegesList.title: Exclusive College Resources
collegesList.subtitle: Quebec government-certified specialized colleges with a variety of professional courses

collegesList.title: Low Tuition Fees
collegesList.subtitle: Offering a variety of specializations, with tuition fees significantly lower than other cities in Canada

collegesList.title: Accelerate Immigration to Quebec
collegesList.subtitle: Many colleges under MIEC offer 1800-hour vocational training courses specifically designed for the PEQ program

examinationCentersTitle: MIEC Has DELF/TEFAQ/TEF Official Examination Centers

examinationCentersList.title: Ensure High Pass Rates
examinationCentersList.subtitle: High-quality teaching resources to help you easily tackle French B2 level

examinationCentersList.title: Pre-Exam Simulation
examinationCentersList.subtitle: Provides pre-exam crash simulations by in-service French oral examiners

examinationCentersList.title: French Training
examinationCentersList.subtitle: A selected team of teachers to cover students at all stages sprinting for the exam
